column5: Headed for Lac Seul first week of July. Be fishing south central part of lake (Lost Island Lodge)....anybody recommend which bait is best.
Dont forget the Dough Ball and Chicken Liver and Stink Bait. Love that stuff on crackers.
i've done well with all 3 that time of year. i prefer crawlers because of the ease of caring for them.
For our group this week in LOW area, Crawlers caught the majority of our bigger walleyes, 23"-26". Leeches were good also but the smallies loved them too. JJ
